channel.title: A few questions i hope you can answer
channel.description:
1. do jagex know about private servers? 2. do blizzard know about private wow servers? 3. how did mopar steal the entire+ more code from jagex? 4. whats srl? 5. is it possible to revive autorune? 6. or is it possible to revive aryan? 7. is there a website that set manga comics to dl? like yu-gi-oh .hack dragonball you name it. 8.what do i need for my new pc to make it run wow tbc [b]totally[/b] with no lag?
hope you can answer my questions. thx on average.

item.title: A few questions i hope you can answer
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

well thanks for the help even tru i still need some sites or like where they write about that stuff but thx alot.

no i dont think it happens to any other thing i type. >zxcvbnm;:*øælkjhgfdsaqwertyu>ZXCVBNM;:*ØÆLKJHGFDSAQWERTYUIOPÅ^^'¨¨?=)(/&%¤#"!§
sorry for the spam but dont seems so anything else double type. oh yes this one ¨¨ its the same button… that means it my keyboard its rong with… my new z-board omg.[br][size=1]Posted on: 04 March 2007, 02:45:07[/size][hr]that arga is pretty good i can see. is the any way i can get it without waitingand posting in the rs-resources.com forums?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions i hope you can answer

item.title: A few questions i hope you can answer
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Modified your post…I was confused why you didn’t seem to type anything below the quote…plus, makes it easier to read

  1. Not quite. Server emulators aren’t using jagex’s code, and are violating no copyright laws. It can be argues that private server clients do as they use the runescape client, but none of them are hosted on this site

  2. I don’t know of any articles…check out http://moparisthebest.com/smf though for more info

  3. SRL is a library for SCAR, whereas SCAR is the color-clicker that performs the procedures in SRL. They are also developed separately.

  4. I would guess most of those use SCAR or some other bot…don’t know what tbh

  5. ARGA is one…rs-resources.com

The reason I said that this is best suited for this forum is because technically dicsussions regarding moparscape and private servers don’t belong here. But as you asked many different questions, I allowed it.

As for your last question…I honestly don’t know why that would be. Does that double-type occur with any other characters?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions i hope you can answer

item.title: A few questions i hope you can answer
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:64000”]1) I would be amazed if they didn’t. [/quote]then why dont they stop it? its breaking the copyright laws

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:64000”]2) ^^ ^^

  1. No one stole any of jagex’s code. winterlove originally made an Rs2 server emulator which pretty much just supported walking and multiplayer. Since then, many others have expanded on it, and the fad grew rapidly on this site, leading to the wide array of servers you see on moparisthebest.com [/quote]anywhere i could an article about it?

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:64000”]4) SRL is the SCAR Resource Library…from what I know about it, its mainly a collection of procedures useful for RS Cheating…don’t quote me though. Just check out the SRL forums here. [/quote]i thought it was some sorty omg (oh my god) thing what ever its called on english. but why a srl and scar forum whent its the same?

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:64000”]5) Not a chance. Jagex has much improved their protocol, and I’m sure that any kind of autorune-like “bot” (or whatever you want to call it) would be easily detected. [/quote]yeah i bet it would but then why cant scar be detected? ive seen like 500 lvl 3 noobs cutting yews in varrock with auto’er.

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:64000”]6) I don’t think anyone will go and revive Aryan (I don’t know of the feasibility of it tbh). But there are several other Rs2 bot developments out there… [/quote]any names or sites?

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:64000”]Can’t really answer the other two for you… [/quote]ah well it dosent matter so much ^^^^

BobDole81:

although you discuss private servers, this thread touches on many topics, I think this question really is best suited for the Questions forum

good this is the question forum then ^^

another question: evry time i want to type ^^ when i press shift then the ^ button it auto makes 2?? why? now i press once; ^^ to times ^^^^
[br][size=1]Posted on: 04 March 2007, 02:08:58[/size][hr]uhm thx for editing?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions i hope you can answer

item.title: A few questions i hope you can answer
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

  1. I would be amazed if they didn’t.

  2. ^^

  3. No one stole any of jagex’s code. winterlove originally made an Rs2 server emulator which pretty much just supported walking and multiplayer. Since then, many others have expanded on it, and the fad grew rapidly on this site, leading to the wide array of servers you see on moparisthebest.com

  4. SRL is the SCAR Resource Library…from what I know about it, its mainly a collection of procedures useful for RS Cheating…don’t quote me though. Just check out the SRL forums here.

  5. Not a chance. Jagex has much improved their protocol, and I’m sure that any kind of autorune-like “bot” (or whatever you want to call it) would be easily detected.

  6. I don’t think anyone will go and revive Aryan (I don’t know of the feasibility of it tbh). But there are several other Rs2 bot developments out there…

Can’t really answer the other two for you…although you discuss private servers, this thread touches on many topics, I think this question really is best suited for the Questions forum

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions i hope you can answer
